location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledges a request for an account of presents made and received during the past official year. He encloses a statement (not included) of the presents made and states that no presents were received during this period.
